paper_abstract: In this paper. we investigate the relationship between generalized rough sets induced by reflexive and transitive relations and the topologies on the universe which is not restricted to be finite. It is proved that there exists a one-to-one correspondence between the set of all reflexive and transitive relations and the set of all topologies which satisfy a certain kind of compactness condition. paper_title: Generalized rough sets based on reflexive and transitive relations
